attractions.title_search: Wood Carving Workshop in Santorini Number 2
attractions.title: Wood Carving Workshop in Santorini Number 2
attractions.description:
An invitation to an artistic time travel discovering the secrets of wood carving.

The woodcarving workshop takes place in the gallery of Michael Arvanitis where he exhibits his works.
The gallery is a traditional cave building in the picturesque village of Megalochori.

In this class, Michalis Arvanitis will help you become familiar with how tools are used to give shape and form to wood and he will teach you how to carve.
attractions.address: Megalochori 847 00, Greece
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

attractions.title_search: Intermittent Fasting: Workshop and Tips
attractions.title: Intermittent Fasting: Workshop and Tips
attractions.description:
This workshop offers a thorough understanding of intermittent fasting, covering its benefits, various methods, and how to seamlessly integrate it into your lifestyle. The interactive Q&A session allows you to get personalized advice and clear any doubts, making it a tailored experience just for you.

Whether you're a beginner curious about intermittent fasting or someone looking to deepen your practice, this workshop is designed to cater to all levels. The clear and concise explanations make complex concepts accessible, ensuring everyone can benefit.

The interactive Q&A session allows you to get personalized advice and clear any doubts, making it a tailored experience just for you.

Choose the format that suits you best. This workshop can be conducted as a private session for personalized, one-on-one guidance, or you can join a group session to learn and share with others on the same journey.
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

attractions.title_search: Private Cooking Class in Rome with a Local Expert Cristina
attractions.title: Private Cooking Class in Rome with a Local Expert Cristina
attractions.description:
Enjoy a private and authentic cooking class in a local home with your host Cristina. This is a perfect experience for anyone looking to connect with local culture over food. Your cooking class will take place in a local home kitchen where Cristina will teach you how to make 2-3 traditional Italian dishes from family recipes. After cooking, you will enjoy your meal together in your hosts' Roman home. Enjoy your cooking lesson over Italian wine while listening to local music. Cristina's experience will be as Italian as it gets, so be ready to might meet her family or friends who regularly join her for meals at her home. Over prosecco and local appetizers, enjoy learning about Rome from a local. 

â¢ Pasta or pizza making and cooking lesson in a local home
â¢ Introduction to Italy's flours and diverse cuisine
â¢ Brief video of Rome
â¢ 100% private activity
â¢ Experience Italian hospitality in a residential Roman neighborhood
â¢ Vegetarian and gluten free options available
attractions.address: Via Segesta, 44, 00179 Roma RM, Italy
attractions.cancellation_policy: All sales are final. No refund is available for cancellations.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Cooking Classes
attractions.english_title: Private Cooking Class in Rome with a Local Expert Cristina

attractions.description: In this private tour get in touch with the history and the art of the Cretan pottery, see how the pots are being manufactured on the wheel, how they are decorated, how they are baked in the furnace so that they can get their final form. After that have the chance to create a ceramic projects with the help of the artists. Then explore a Honey museum in a mini guided tour and visit Melidoni cave, a natural stalactites cave with a background history. Last taste greek and cretan dishes in a local taverna.

attractions.title_search: Pelion Private Experience: Farm-to-Table Cooking
attractions.title: Pelion Private Experience: Farm-to-Table Cooking
attractions.description:
Join us for an intimate and immersive experience on a private farm tour and cooking class. Nestled in a stunning location surrounded by the natural beauty of the Greek countryside. 
Your journey begins with a guided walk around the farm, where you'll explore the lush landscape and learn about the rich biodiversity that thrives here. As you stroll through the fields, you'll have the opportunity to pick fresh greens, aromatic herbs, and seasonal vegetables straight from our garden. You'll also visit the chicken coop to collect farm-fresh eggs!
After gathering your ingredients, you'll join us next to our traditional wood-fired oven, ready for the culinary adventure ahead. Under the guidance of our expert hosts, youâll cook a selection of traditional recipes from Greece and the Pelion region, using the fresh produce you've just harvested. 
At the end of the class, you'll sit down to enjoy the delicious meal you've prepared, surrounded by the serene beauty of the farm.
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

attractions.title_search: 4 Hour Cooking Class in Tuscan Farmhouse near Siena
attractions.title: 4 Hour Cooking Class in Tuscan Farmhouse near Siena
attractions.description:
Prepare traditional Tuscan dishes using recipes from a true local family. Our family has lived in the area for generations and has been running the agriturismo for over 20 years with our intimate and informal style. Always listen to Nonna!

Visit an authentic 17th-century farmhouse and taste some fresh, organic foods. For the class and the meal, we use exclusively fresh local ingredients, including those produced on our farm: oil, vegetables, fruit, jams, chestnuts, and eggs. 

We grow our produce in a sustainable way, without the use of pesticides and chemicals. For us, farming is synonymous with respect for the environment and protection of the land. We are in love with the beautiful Sienese countryside!

Enjoy a delicious meal in the company of both locals and fellow travelers. We will be happy not only to share great food, but also to tell you about our territory and its history, and give you some valuable advice that only a true local would know!
attractions.address: Strada Provinciale 52, della Montagnola Senese, 21, 53018 Sovicille SI, Italy
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Cooking Classes; Small Group
attractions.english_title: 4 Hour Cooking Class in Tuscan Farmhouse near Siena

attractions.title_search: Japanese Kimono Workshop and History
attractions.title: Japanese Kimono Workshop and History
attractions.description:
Kimono, a symbolic icon of Japanese culture, is not just something you wear. It reflects how we live and feel in our daily lives. During your special visit to Japan, I would like to offer you a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to experience the unique wisdom of kimono. The knowledge and experience you gain from this workshop will be the most valuable souvenir to bring home from Japan.

This workshop offers a rich cultural and artistic experience that will stimulate your senses. Perfect for those who want to see real kimonos crafted with the finest authentic techniques in Japan, it provides a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in traditional Japanese artistry. While itâs ideal for adults and older children who can appreciate the intricate details and cultural significance, it might be challenging for small children to fully understand and engage with the content.

attractions.title_search: Magical sounds of the Kokle - Learn how to play it
attractions.title: Magical sounds of the Kokle - Learn how to play it
attractions.description: Are you curious about exploring local folk music and instruments all around the world? Then this workshop is for you! A local folk musician will introduce you to the kokle, a traditional Latvian string instrument. Latvians have a saying that the kokle is given to us by God, but the bagpipes - by the Devil. It will take only a few seconds to understand why we say that. We can assure you that the kokle has one of the purest, most magical, and calming sounds among all the instruments you have ever heard. You will have an opportunity to lure out some ancient melodies from the kokle by yourself.

attractions.title_search: Standup Paddling Courses and Excursions
attractions.title: Standup Paddling Courses and Excursions
attractions.description:
My standup paddling tours are designed for pairs or groups up to 8 persons, who like to explore the coast, in a peaceful, fun and sustainable way. It starts with a conversation which merges in to a plan, that suddenly becomes real, as you are standing on a SUP board with your friends or family, discovering something nice about our nature, yourself or each other. 
You don't have to be an experienced paddler, because we are about the trip to your skills. My Grand SUPs are large and stable, (240l) which makes everyone feel comfy after trying out for a short time. 
Be aware that even if it's called Standup paddling, you don't have to be standing on the board. In some cases sitting or kneeling can feel like a safer option. Feel free to do what you like the most.

attractions.description: Dreamhouse Studios is a female-founded creative studio in Savannah's Starland District. Allison, your instructor, is a local artist and has over 7 years of workshop experience. You'll have a blast hanging out for a morning- leisurely painting, sipping on bubbly, and checking out all the artist's studios. After the workshop, feel free to walk around the shop downstairs and check out other amazing retail and food spots in the neighborhood!

attractions.title_search: Private Wing Foil Lessons in Curacao
attractions.title: Private Wing Foil Lessons in Curacao
attractions.description:
What do you get when you combine windsurfing, kiteboarding, surfing and foiling? Wingfoiling! 
Experience the thrill of wingfoiling on the calm, flat Spanish Waters. Our lessons are perfect for all skill levels. Learn from expert instructors with personalized attention. Enjoy the safety and convenience of boat assistance. We provide top-quality gear for an unforgettable adventure. Our unique location offers stunning views and ideal conditions. Discover the excitement of wingfoiling in a beautiful and serene setting.

attractions.title: Georgian traditional sweet "Churchkhela" master class!!
attractions.description: You'll learn unique Georgian traditional sweet cooking techniques by local chef in 220 years traditional building that is like a village house. On the other hand, our location is in the heart of the city so you don't have to go to a far countryside to feel the countryside spirit. attractions.title_search: 2 Days Class: SDI Open Water Diver Certification in Cancun
attractions.title: 3 Days Class: SDI Open Water Diver Certification in Cancun
attractions.description:
Take the next step becoming a certified diver and dive around the world with a valid license!

This course is designed to give you the necessary skills to conduct open water dives and the key to explore most dive destinations and discover the wonders of the underwater world!

SDI is a high reputed dive agency around the world with quality scuba training programs ruled by the World Recreational Scuba Training Council (RSTC).

IMPORTANT: - People with asthma, heart or brain problems, high blood pressure, lung lesions, diabetes, epilepsy, or surgeries less than 1 year are not allowed to dive unless you bring a medical authorization signed by your physician who specializes in your disease.
- Keep in mind you need to rest between 18 - 24 hours after diving before take an airplane.
- Consider for this activity you need to perform scuba skills in the water if you are not able to do it, you can not dive for safety reasons, there is not refund back for these reasons, as the service is provided
attractions.address: Km 5.5, Blvd. Kukulcan, Kukulcan Boulevard, Zona Hotelera, 77500 CancÃºn, Q.R.,
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Scuba Diving; Freediving; On the Water; Extreme Sports; Small Group
attractions.english_title: 3 Days Class: SDI Open Water Diver Certification in Cancun

attractions.title_search: 2h30 Organic Chocolate Making Workshop in Cusco
attractions.title: 2h30 Organic Chocolate Making Workshop in Cusco
attractions.description:
If you're planning a trip to Cusco, Peru, you're in for a treat, and I'm here to make your experience even more memorable with my chocolate workshop. Cusco is known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning landscapes, and the world of chocolate is a significant part of the city's heritage. As a passionate chocolatier, I'm excited to offer you an experience that will take you on a journey through the history, art, and science of chocolate.

In conclusion, our chocolate workshop in Cusco is an authentic and unforgettable experience that combines history, culture, art, and science. You'll learn about the history of chocolate, make your own chocolate, taste the difference, support local farmers, and take home a delicious souvenir. Don't miss the opportunity to indulge in this sweet adventure - book your chocolate workshop today!
attractions.address: C. PasÃ±apakana 133, Cusco 08000, Peru
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Cooking Classes
attractions.english_title: 2h30 Organic Chocolate Making Workshop in Cusco

attractions.title_search: Private Indian-Mexican Fusion Cooking Class with a Modern Cook in Chicago
attractions.title: Private Indian-Mexican Fusion Cooking Class with a Modern Cook in Chicago
attractions.description:
Enjoy a private and authentic cooking class in a local home with host Ruby who comes from a family that is all about communal eating and hosting large family gatherings, where good food and great conversations are the backbone of any meal. This is a perfect experience for anyone looking to connect with local culture over food. Your cooking class will take place in a local home kitchen where Ruby will teach you how to make 2-3 Indian-Mexcian dishes from their family recipes. After cooking, you will enjoy your meal together in your host's home.

â¢ Private cooking lesson in a local home
â¢ Introduction to India's culture and cuisine
â¢ Learn to cook either traditional Indian meal or Indian-Mexican fusion
â¢ 100% private activity
â¢ Experience Indian hospitality in a residential Chicago neighborhood
â¢ Vegetarian and gluten free options available
attractions.address: Chicago, IL, USA
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Cooking Classes

attractions.title_search: Corfood bites - Cooking classes by Christos
attractions.title: Corfood bites - Cooking classes by Christos
attractions.description: If you are looking for a unique culinary experience, then join us in a hands-on cooking class, where you will be initiated into the secrets of Greek cuisine. We will prepare and cook four starters together. This is a good excuse to enjoy a glass of tsipouro, a homemade distilled spirit from mainland Greece. Although many salads exist throughout Greece, none can beat a traditional Greek salad. Therefore, we will prepare this colourful and nutritious dish, unlike anything you have tried until now, with most of the ingredients freshly picked from our garden. Next is our main course: a dish from the local Corfiot cuisine or another famous Greek dish. Prepare your senses for an explosion of flavours and treat yourselves to top-quality local white wine. There is no Greek feast without a traditional sweet, so indulge yourselves with one of the most famous Greek desserts. Whether it is baklava or halva, galaktoboureko or orange pie, it will end your day at Corfood Bites in the sweetest way.
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Best Conversion; Cooking Classes; Small Group
attractions.english_title: Corfood bites - Cooking classes by Christos

attractions.title_search: San Franciscoâs Essential Chocolate Chip Cookie Workshop
attractions.title: San Franciscoâs Essential Chocolate Chip Cookie Workshop
attractions.description:
[LGBTQ+ friendly of course. We welcome everyone into our home.] 

Indulge in a three-hour interactive chocolate chip cookie baking experience like no other! Led by Brennan, a seasoned baker with a legacy of culinary expertise, you'll delve into the history and culture of the iconic American chocolate chip cookie. Not only will you get to bake Brennan's coveted family recipe using top-shelf ingredients, but you'll also take a journey of chocolate discovery by tasting four distinct American chocolate varieties. Plus, uncover the secret ingredient that elevates these cookies to perfection. Take home your freshly baked cookies and also the know-how to recreate them in your own kitchen. Please note that this experience isn't vegan-friendly or gluten-free. Don't miss this intimate and immersive workshop, conveniently located near San Francisco's Golden Gate Park, where you'll not only learn the art of the perfect chocolate chip cookie but also savor a slice of authentic American culture.
attractions.address: 145 Balboa St, San Francisco, CA 94118-4049, USA
attractions.cancellation_policy: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.
attractions.external_categories: Food & Drink; Cooking Classes; Small Group; Excellent Quality
attractions.english_title: San Franciscoâs Essential Chocolate Chip Cookie Workshop

attractions.title: Beading Class and tour a Non-profit vocational training center a Fun cultural sharing experience
attractions.description:
A true cultural sharing experience by making beaded friendship bracelet jewelry with a local Mayan woman. Perfect for individual travelers, volunteer groups, and families. Learn about the Mayan culture, and get a glimpse into their daily life. Â Beading class is around 2 hours, lunch is 1 hour or less, the village tour is around 2 hours.

Income from classes and tours supports our non-profit economic empowerment and social enterprise programs at CECAP vocational center
